description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a quiz page, including state management, question rendering, user interaction, and integration with a mock repository for quiz data and streak tracking.

classes.name: QuizPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that presents a daily mythology quiz with streak tracking.

classes.name: _QuizPageState
classes.description: State class managing quiz questions, user interactions, and UI rendering specific to QuizPage.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes quiz questions from the repository when the widget is first created.

methods.name: _select
methods.description: Handles user selection of an answer, updates score if correct.

methods.name: _next
methods.description: Advances to the next question or finishes the quiz, updating streaks accordingly.

methods.name: _restart
methods.description: Restarts the quiz by reloading questions and resetting scores and state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the quiz, showing either questions or summary based on completion.

methods.name: _buildSummary
methods.description: Builds the summary view after quiz completion, displaying score, streak, and restart button.

methods.name: _buildQuestion
methods.description: Builds the question view, including options, score, and navigation.
